name: Sid Meier's CivNet
description:
Sid Meier's CivNet is a strategy game developed by MPS Labs. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by MicroProse. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Sid Meier's CivNet on PC.
Sid Meier produced the game. Jeffery L. Briggs scored the game.
